annotations.annotation: State Government Article, §9-20B-01 et seq., Annotated Code of Maryland
Regulations .01—.07 adopted as an emergency provision effective January 1, 2005 (31:23 Md. R. 1649); adopted permanently effective January 6, 2005 (31:26 Md. R. 1865)
Regulation .02B amended as an emergency provision effective July 1, 2008 (35:15 Md. R. 1345); emergency action expired effective December 28, 2008
Regulation .04 amended as an emergency provision effective July 1, 2008 (35:15 Md. R. 1345); emergency action expired effective December 28, 2008
Regulation .05 amended as an emergency provision effective July 1, 2008 (35:15 Md. R. 1345); emergency action expired effective December 28, 2008
Chapter revised as an emergency provision effective May 18, 2012 (39:12 Md. R. 743); emergency provision expired November 13, 2012
Regulations .01—.07 repealed and new Regulations .01—.11 adopted as an emergency provision effective December 12, 2012 (40:1 Md. R. 16); emergency action expired effective May 30, 2013

Regulations .01—.07 under Solar Energy Grant Program repealed and new Regulations .01— .13 under Clean Energy Grant Program adopted as an emergency provision effective October 11, 2013 (40:22 Md. R. 1871); adopted permanently effective February 3, 2014 (41:2 Md. R. 92)
Regulations .01—.13 repealed effective April 15, 2024 (51:7 Md. R. 333)
